imgDesc.text:
The enigmatic "symphony" seems to be from a now-destroyed civilization.
You can use its power to unleash <color=#ffe14b>two types of soundwaves</color> .

Use the power of the "Symphony" to resonate with entities that react to the power of music.
<color=#ffe14b>Press to activate a Pause Soundwave</color> and cause specific objects in the area to stop moving. Continuously <color=#ffe14b>Hold to activate a Play Soundwave</color> , which will cause specific objects in the area to start moving or reactivate entities affected by a <color=#ffe14b>Pause Soundwave</color> .

<color=#ffe14b>Special musical notes</color> float above objects that can be influenced by the power of the "symphony." When they resonate with specific soundwaves, the notes above them will also change.
Not all objects that can be influenced by music can resonate with different soundwaves. Most of them can only interact with a specific soundwave.
